" THE 100 STITCHES - How to clothe the people rightly "


There be three main ways to make clothing, sewing and weaving


Sewing requires a needle used on cloth or leathers, and keep nearby fibres, furs, leather, and so on as needed. This arte is most useful for common clothing and padding, fancy hats may require a feather as well.


Weaving requires a loom, place thy silk in it, and keep what else may be needed such as fibres, cloth, leather, furs that may be needed to complete your work. You can make padded gambesons as well but then thou must starte with the cloth, for silk is not needed.


On the art of dyes: Cheap dyes are made from a base of ash, thereafter add jackesberries or swampweed until thy mix is perfected. Added to any bin allowes you to easily dye many a pieces of clothing. More luxurious dyes can be imported by the Merchant.
